snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a profile of the philosopher behind a data-mining start-up that helped find and kill Osama Bin Laden. Plus, new research showed that using...
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a profile of the philosopher behind a data-mining start-up that helped find and kill Osama Bin Laden. Plus, new research showed that using Facebook erodes overall well-being.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: The C.I.A.-Backed Start-Up and Facebook Blues
